languages.text: "Вам необходимо проставить две печати одобрения на врученную мной грамоту. Исполнить сие несложно — в Империуме работу заверителей уже больше полусотни лет исполняют придворные администратумы-сервиторы. Одного вы точно сможете отыскать на Даргонусе — во дворце {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольного Торговца{/g}. Второй же обязан хранить печать в системе Теликос Эпсилон".

traits.locale_text: "Вам необходимо проставить две печати одобрения на врученную мной грамоту. Исполнить сие несложно — в Империуме работу заверителей уже больше полусотни исполняют придворные администратумы-сервиторы. Одного вы точно сможете отыскать на Даргонусе — во дворце {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольного Торговца{/g}. Второй же обязан хранить печать в системе Теликос Эпсилон".

languages.text: "You must have two seals of approval affixed to the document with which I furnished you. It is easily done — in the Imperium, Administratum servitors have been performing the duties of certification officers for more than fifty years already. You will find one such servitor here on Dargonus in the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}'s palace. The second is duty-bound to keep the seal in the Telikos Epsilon System."
languages.original_text: "Вам необходимо проставить две печати одобрения на врученную мной грамоту. Исполнить сие несложно — в Империуме работу заверителей уже больше полусотни лет исполняют придворные администратумы-сервиторы. Одного вы точно сможете отыскать на Даргонусе — во дворце {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольного Торговца{/g}. Второй же обязан хранить печать в системе Теликос Эпсилон".

traits.locale_text: "You must have two seals of approval affixed to the document with which I furnished you. It is easily done — in the Imperium, Administratum servitors have been performing the duties of certification officers for more than 150 cycles already. You will find one such servitor here on Dargonus in the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}'s palace. The second is duty-bound to keep the seal in the Telikos Epsilon System."

It is easily done — in the Imperium, Administratum servitors have been performing the duties of certification officers for more than 150 cycles already. You will find one such servitor here on Dargonus in the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}'s palace. The second is duty-bound to keep the seal in the Telikos Epsilon System."

It is easily done — in the Imperium, Administratum servitors have been performing the duties of certification officers for more than 150 cycles already. You will find one such servitor here on Dargonus in the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}'s palace. The second is duty-bound to keep the seal in the Telikos Epsilon System."

"You must have two seals of approval affixed to the document with which I furnished you. It is easily done — in the Imperium, Administratum servitors have been performing the duties of certification officers for more than 150 cycles already. You will find one such servitor here on Dargonus in the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}'s palace. The second is duty-bound to keep the seal in the Telikos Epsilon System."

languages.text: “你需要在我提供给你的文件上加盖两个印章。这些章很容易弄到，像这样的事务，帝国内政部的机仆已经处理过150个年了。第一位负责盖章的机仆在{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}在达戈努斯的宫殿中，而第二位负责盖章的机仆，则位于特里克斯·伊普西隆星系。”
languages.original_text: "You must have two seals of approval affixed to the document with which I furnished you. It is easily done — in the Imperium, Administratum servitors have been performing the duties of certification officers for more than fifty years already. You will find one such servitor here on Dargonus in the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}'s palace. The second is duty-bound to keep the seal in the Telikos Epsilon System."

traits.locale_text: “你需要在我提供给你的文件上加盖两个印章。这些章很容易弄到，像这样的事务，帝国内政部的奴工已经处理过150个周期了。第一位负责盖章的奴工在{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}在达戈努斯的宫殿中，而第二位负责盖章的奴工，则位于特里克斯·伊普西隆星系。”

languages.text: «Debe aplicar dos sellos de aprobación al documento que le he proporcionado. Es una tarea sencilla; los servidores del Administratum de la corte del Imperium llevan cincuenta años gestionando esta tarea. Uno de los servidores está aquí en Dargonus, en el palacio de{mf|l| la} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g}. El deber exige al segundo que vele por el sello en el sistema Telikos Epsilon».
languages.original_text: "You must have two seals of approval affixed to the document with which I furnished you. It is easily done — in the Imperium, Administratum servitors have been performing the duties of certification officers for more than fifty years already. You will find one such servitor here on Dargonus in the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}'s palace. The second is duty-bound to keep the seal in the Telikos Epsilon System."

traits.locale_text: «Debe aplicar dos sellos de aprobación al documento que le he proporcionado. Es una tarea sencilla; los servidores del Administratum de la corte del Imperium llevan 150 ciclos gestionando esta tarea. Uno de los servidores está aquí en Dargonus, en el palacio de{mf|l| la} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g}. El deber exige al segundo que vele por el sello en el sistema Telikos Epsilon».

languages.text: 「お渡しした書類に承認印をふたつ、もらってきてください。すぐに終わりますよ。帝国では、行政局のサーヴィターが証明役の聖務に50年以上も従事しています。一体はここダルゴナスの{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}宮殿に、もう一体はティリコス・イプシロン・システムで印鑑を保護する聖務に就いています」
languages.original_text: "You must have two seals of approval affixed to the document with which I furnished you. It is easily done — in the Imperium, Administratum servitors have been performing the duties of certification officers for more than fifty years already. You will find one such servitor here on Dargonus in the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}'s palace. The second is duty-bound to keep the seal in the Telikos Epsilon System."

traits.locale_text: 「お渡しした書類に承認印をふたつ、もらってきてください。すぐに終わりますよ。帝国では、行政局のサーヴィターが証明役の聖務に50年以上も従事しています。一体はここダルゴナスの{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}宮殿に、もう一体はティリコス・イプシロン・システムで印鑑を保護する聖務に就いています」

languages.text: « Vous devez faire apposer deux sceaux de conformité sur le document que je vous ai remis. Simple formalité. Au sein de l'Imperium, cela fait déjà plus de cinquante ans que les servitors administratifs font le travail des agents de certification. Vous en trouverez un ici même, sur Dargonus, dans le palais {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}{/g}. Quant au second, il est chargé de garder le sceau dans le système Telikos Epsilon. »
languages.original_text: "You must have two seals of approval affixed to the document with which I furnished you. It is easily done — in the Imperium, Administratum servitors have been performing the duties of certification officers for more than fifty years already. You will find one such servitor here on Dargonus in the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}'s palace. The second is duty-bound to keep the seal in the Telikos Epsilon System."

traits.locale_text: « Vous devez faire apposer deux sceaux de conformité sur le document que je vous ai remis. Simple formalité. Au sein de l'Imperium, cela fait déjà plus de 150 cycles que les servitors administratifs font le travail des agents de certification. Vous en trouverez un ici même, sur Dargonus, dans le palais {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}{/g}. Quant au second, il est chargé de garder le sceau dans le système Telikos Epsilon. »

languages.text: "Ihr benötigt zwei Prüfsiegel auf dem Dokument, das ich Euch gegeben habe. Im Grund ganz einfach – im Imperium erfüllen Administratum-Servitoren schon seit über fünfzig Jahren die Aufgaben von Zertifizierungsoffizieren. Einen dieser Servitoren findet ihr hier auf Dargonus, im Palast {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}{/g}. Der zweite hat die Pflicht, das Siegel im System Telikos Epsilon zu schützen."
languages.original_text: "You must have two seals of approval affixed to the document with which I furnished you. It is easily done — in the Imperium, Administratum servitors have been performing the duties of certification officers for more than fifty years already. You will find one such servitor here on Dargonus in the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}'s palace. The second is duty-bound to keep the seal in the Telikos Epsilon System."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr benötigt zwei Prüfsiegel auf dem Dokument, das ich Euch gegeben habe. Im Grund ganz einfach – im Imperium erfüllen Administratum-Servitoren schon seit über 150 Zyklen die Aufgaben von Zertifizierungsoffizieren. Einen dieser Servitoren findet ihr hier auf Dargonus, im Palast {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}. Der zweite hat die Pflicht, das Siegel im System Telikos Epsilon zu schützen."

languages.text: "Size tedarik ettiğim belgeye iki onay mührü basmalısınız. Bunu yapmak zor bir iş değil... İmparatorluk'ta Administratum hizmetörleri, elli yıldan uzun bir süredir tasdikname memuru olarak görevlerini yerine getiriyor. {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir'in{/g} Dargonus'taki sarayında böyle bir hizmetör bulacaksınız. İkincisi ise vazifesi gereği mührü Telikos Epsilon Sistemi'nde tutuyor."
languages.original_text: "You must have two seals of approval affixed to the document with which I furnished you. It is easily done — in the Imperium, Administratum servitors have been performing the duties of certification officers for more than fifty years already. You will find one such servitor here on Dargonus in the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}'s palace. The second is duty-bound to keep the seal in the Telikos Epsilon System."
